OBUISEL_SELECTOR.NAME: Product Complete
OBUISEL_SELECTOR.FILTER_EXPRESSION: "(prodtrl is null or prodtrllan.language =\'" + OB.getContext().getLanguage().getLanguage() +"\') and (uomtrl is null or uomtrllan.language = \'" + OB.getContext().getLanguage().getLanguage() +"\') and (orderuomuomtrl is null or orderuomuomtrl.language = \'" + OB.getContext().getLanguage().getLanguage() +"\')"
OBUISEL_SELECTOR.HQL: select prod.searchKey as searchkey, COALESCE(prodtrl.name, prod.name) as prodname, CASE when sb is null then ' ' else to_char(w.name || ' - ' || sb.searchKey || ' - ' || sb.rowX || '-' || sb.stackY || '-' || sb.levelZ) end as locator, COALESCE(sd.quantityOnHand, 0) as qtyonhand, COALESCE(uomtrl.name, prod.uOM.name) as uom, CASE WHEN sd is not null then sdattribute.description WHEN COALESCE(prod.useAttributeSetValueAs, '-') = 'D' THEN prodattribute.description END as attribute, COALESCE(sd.onHandOrderQuanity, 0) as qtyorderonhand, COALESCE(orderuomuomtrl.name, orderuomuom.name) as orderuom, COALESCE(sd.quantityInDraftTransactions, 0) as preqtyonhand, COALESCE(sd.quantityOrderInDraftTransactions, 0) as preqtyorderonhand, prod.searchKey || ' - ' || COALESCE(prodtrl.name, prod.name) || ' - ' || COALESCE(sd.quantityOnHand, 0) || ' ' || COALESCE(uomtrl.name, prod.uOM.name) || CASE WHEN sd is not null and COALESCE(sdattribute, '0') != '0' then to_char(' - ' || sdattribute.description) WHEN COALESCE(prod.useAttributeSetValueAs, '-') = 'D' and prodattribute is not null THEN to_char(' - ' || prodattribute.description) END as display_field, sb.id as locatorout, CASE WHEN sd is not null then sd.attributeSetValue.id ELSE prod.attributeSetValue.id END as attributeout, sd.onHandOrderQuanity as qtyorderout, orderuomuom.id as orderuomout, prod.uOM.id as uomout, prod.id as productid from Product prod left join prod.productTrlList prodtrl left join prodtrl.language prodtrllan left join prod.uOM.uOMTrlList uomtrl left join uomtrl.language uomtrllan left join prod.materialMgmtStorageDetailList sd left join sd.storageBin sb left join sb.warehouse w left join sd.attributeSetValue sdattribute left join prod.attributeSetValue prodattribute left join sd.orderUOM orderuom left join orderuom.uOM orderuomuom left join orderuomuom.uOMTrlList orderuomuomtrl left join orderuomuomtrl.language orderuomuomtrllan where @additional_filters@

OBUISEL_SELECTOR.NAME: Business Partner with contact and location
OBUISEL_SELECTOR.HQL: SELECT distinct bp.name as name,bp.id as bpid, bp.searchKey as value, bp.creditLimit - bp.creditUsed as creditAvailable, bp.creditUsed as creditUsed, COALESCE(contact.name, usercontact.name) as contactname, COALESCE(contact.id, usercontact.id) as contactid, bploc.name as locationname, bploc.id as locationid, bp.customer as customer, bp.vendor as vendor, bp.lifetimeRevenueToDate as income FROM BusinessPartner bp left join bp.businessPartnerLocationList bploc left join bploc.locationAddress loc left join bploc.aDUserList contact left join loc.region region left join bp.aDUserList usercontact where @additional_filters@ and usercontact.partnerAddress is null and bp.summaryLevel = false
